reactor.io.net.netty

Class NettyNetChannel<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.net.AbstractNetChannel<IN,OUT>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetChannel<IN,OUT>

    public class NettyNetChannel<IN,OUT>
extends AbstractNetChannel<IN,OUT>
    NetChannel implementation that delegates to Netty.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini
